amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to transfer $5 million from the Environmental Protection Agency to fund active forest management at U.S. Forest Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
